homepage.heading: Find Your Perfect Rental Car
homepage.subheading: Compare prices from multiple providers and book the best car rental deals worldwide. Your journey starts here.

top_rated.heading: Top Rated Cars
top_rated.desc: Discover our most popular and highly-rated vehicles chosen by thousands of satisfied customers.
top_rated.check_back: Check back later for our latest vehicles.

how_it_works.heading: How It Works
how_it_works.desc: Renting a car with Rentify is simple and hassle-free. Just follow these easy steps to get started:

steps.title: Search & Compare
steps.desc: Enter your pickup location and dates to instantly compare cars from top rental providers in your area.

steps.title: Choose Your Car
steps.desc: Browse a wide range of vehicles, from economy to luxury, and select the one that fits your needs and budget.

steps.title: Book Instantly
steps.desc: Reserve your car in just a few clicks with our secure and seamless booking process. No hidden fees.

steps.title: Pick Up & Drive
steps.desc: Head to your selected location, pick up your car, and enjoy your journey with confidence and support from Rentify.

why.heading: Why Choose Rentify?
why.desc: Experience the best in car rental with Rentify. Here’s why thousands trust us:

features.title: Best Price Guarantee
features.desc: We compare prices across multiple providers to ensure you always get the lowest rates available.

features.title: Instant Booking
features.desc: Book your car in real time and receive instant confirmation—no waiting, no uncertainty.

features.title: Secure & Safe
features.desc: Your personal information and payments are protected with industry-leading security standards.

features.title: Top Quality Service
features.desc: Our dedicated support team and comprehensive service make your rental experience smooth and reliable.

about.heading: About Rentify
about.desc: We're revolutionizing the car rental industry by connecting travelers with the best rental deals from trusted providers worldwide. Our mission is to make car rental simple, transparent, and accessible to everyone.
about.mission_1: To democratize car rental by providing a single platform where travelers can compare, choose, and book from the world's leading rental providers. We believe everyone deserves access to reliable, affordable transportation, no matter where their journey takes them.
about.mission_2: Founded in 2020, Rentify has grown from a simple idea to a comprehensive platform serving millions of travelers worldwide. We're proud to have facilitated over 2 million successful car rentals and counting.
about.values_desc: These core values guide everything we do and shape how we serve our customers and partners.

values.title: Customer First
values.desc: We prioritize our customers' needs and strive to exceed their expectations in every interaction.

values.title: Global Reach
values.desc: We connect travelers with rental options worldwide, making mobility accessible everywhere.

values.title: Quality Assurance
values.desc: We maintain high standards by partnering only with trusted, verified rental providers.

values.title: Innovation
values.desc: We continuously innovate to simplify the car rental process and enhance user experience.

about.team_desc: Our passionate team of experts is dedicated to transforming the car rental experience.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.desc: Have questions or need assistance? We're here to help! Reach out to our friendly support team.
contact.get_in_touch_desc: Whether you have questions about our service, need help with a booking, or want to partner with us, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.email_us_desc: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours.
contact.call_us_desc: Speak directly with our support team.
contact.address:
123 Rental Street
San Francisco, CA 94105
United States
contact.faq_desc: Quick answers to common questions about Rentify.

faq.a: Rentify is a car rental aggregator that compares prices and options from multiple rental providers. Simply search for your desired location and dates, compare available cars, and book directly with your chosen provider.

faq.q: Is it free to use Rentify?
faq.a: Yes! Rentify is completely free for customers. We earn a small commission from our partner rental providers when you complete a booking, but this doesn't affect the price you pay.

faq.q: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
faq.a: Cancellation and modification policies vary by rental provider. You can find specific terms and conditions for your booking in your confirmation email or by contacting the rental provider directly.

faq.q: What if I have issues with my rental?
faq.a: While you book through Rentify, your rental agreement is with the provider. For immediate assistance during your rental, contact the provider directly. For other concerns, our support team is here to help mediate and resolve issues.

footer.desc: Your trusted car rental aggregator, helping you find the best deals from multiple providers worldwide.
